name: Dracula
author: Bram Stoker
short description: The story of eternal love and eternal damnation: that's where all the vampire sagas of our time came from.

name: The Fisherman and His Soul
author: Oscar Wilde
short description: A romantic tale about the mad love of a dolphin fisherman and a mermaid.

name: Mr. Bean In Town
author: Richard Curtis
short description: Mr. Bean will always find adventures for his wild little head! The eccentric eccentric continues to surprise and make the reader laugh.
